name: Tori-Emaki
description:
PLAYSTATION®Eye required. Presented in High-Definition 1080p resolution, Tori-Emaki is an interactive art experience designed exclusively for use with the PLAYSTATION®Eye camera. Enter a world of atmospheric wonder as you unravel a magical journey by guiding a flock of birds through a living masterpiece. Move your body with the PLAYSTATION®Eye to vary the speed and direction of the birds' flight. Send them soaring through beautiful scenes inspired by Ancient Japanese paintings and prints while traditional music and lifelike sound effects accompany this relaxing experience.

Tori-Emaki is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. ©2007 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe.
Dolby and the double-D symbol are trademarks of Dolby Laboratories.
